value.title: AI can't be legally credited as an inventor, says USPTO
value.excerpt: The agency issued a decision on two patent applications for devices created by an AI system, determining that only humans can legally be credited as inventors. The items in question -- an emergency flashlight and a shape-shifting drink container -- were the brainchildren of a system called DABUS.

images.title: AI can't be legally credited as an inventor, says USPTO
